instruction: You are given a question on college chemistry. You are also given 4 answer options (associated with "A", "B", "C", "D"), out of which only one is correct. input:

(A)PbH4 < SnH4 < GeH4 < SiH4 < CH4 (B)PbH4 < SnH4 < CH4 < GeH4 < SiH4 (C)CH4 < SiH4 < GeH4 < SnH4 < PbH4 (D)CH4 < PbH4 < GeH4 < SnH4 < SiH4
